author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-4148] Moving out into a separate IT from MNG-4347, and using a remote repository instead of a local repo directory structure to be copied in. This hopefully future-proofs the IT from changes in the local repo structure.

author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-4148][MNG-4347] Fixing through-line for the new session-specific metadata source, which is set in the execution request, passed into the session through that, and eventually used in the plugin manager and the extension manager from the session.
